fnmatch.h

00034 #ifndef _LIBU_FNMATCH_H_
00035 #define _LIBU_FNMATCH_H_
00036 #include <u/libu_conf.h>
00037 
00038 #ifdef HAVE_FNMATCH
00039 #include <fnmatch.h>
00040 #else 
00041 
00042 #ifdef __cplusplus
00043 extern "C" {
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #define FNM_NOMATCH     1       /* Match failed. */
00047 #define FNM_NOSYS       2       /* Function not implemented. */
00048 
00049 #define FNM_NOESCAPE    0x01    /* Disable backslash escaping. */
00050 #define FNM_PATHNAME    0x02    /* Slash must be matched by slash. */
00051 #define FNM_PERIOD      0x04    /* Period must be matched by period. */
00052 
00053 #define FNM_CASEFOLD    0x08    /* Pattern is matched case-insensitive */
00054 #define FNM_LEADING_DIR 0x10    /* Ignore /<tail> after Imatch. */
00055 
00056 int      fnmatch(const char *, const char *, int);
00057 
00058 #ifdef __cplusplus
00059 }
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #endif /* ! HAVE_FNMATCH */
00063 
00064 #endif /* ! _LIBU_FNMATCH_H_ */
